glsa.title: TORQUE Resource Manager: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in TORQUE Resource Manager, possibly resulting in escalation of privileges or remote code execution.

background.p: TORQUE is a resource manager and queuing system based on OpenPBS.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in TORQUE Resource Manager. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges, execute arbitrary code, or bypass security restrictions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All TORQUE Resource Manager 4.x users should upgrade to the latest version:
All TORQUE Resource Manager 2.x users should upgrade to the latest version:

NOTE: One or more of the issues described in this advisory have been fixed in previous updates. They are included in this advisory for the sake of completeness. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by them.
